basic.description:
The function of organs, body systems and the integration of functions in the whole body.
NOTE    Offered by e-learning in Summer Term. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
LEARNING HOURS    300 (300O)
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Physiology for Health Sciences

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 2 and (a GPA of 2.0 in BIOL102 and BIOL103) or permission of the instructor.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from KNPE 125/3.0; KNPE 225/3.0; PHGY 210/6.0; PHGY 212/6.0; PHGY 214/6.0
